/.title: Hypixel Fossil Finder
/.description: The Hypixel Fossil Finder is a tool to help you locate fossils from suspicious scrap in Hypixel Skyblock. Input your current excavation state to get a list of potential fossils and the best follow-up actions to maximize your findings.

/solver.title: Hypixel Fossil Finder - Solver
/solver.description: Use the Fossil Solver tool to locate fossils from suspicious scrap in Hypixel Skyblock. Input your current excavation state to get a list of potential fossils and the best follow-up actions to maximize your findings.

/fossils.title: Hypixel Fossil Finder - Archive
/fossils.description: Explore the Fossil Archive to view, add, edit, or delete fossils. Manage the known fossil collection efficiently and contribute to the community by sharing new discoveries or correcting errors.
